alert.note: Alert for Midland (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 11 at 11:16AM EDT until May 11 at 12:00PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON EDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN MIDLAND COUNTY... At 1116 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Oil City, or near Coleman, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Oil City around 1140 AM EDT. Pleasant Valley around 1215 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Gordonville and Porter Township. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
